nl.inl.blacklab.config

Class OldConfigReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.inl.blacklab.indexers.config.YamlJsonReader
      • nl.inl.blacklab.config.OldConfigReader

  • public class OldConfigReader
extends YamlJsonReader
    Reads blacklab.yaml/.json file from one of the config dirs. This file contains general BlackLab settings that apply to multiple applications, i.e. IndexTool, QueryTool, BlackLab Server, and other applications that use BlackLab. Config dirs are, in search order: $BLACKLAB_CONFIG_DIR/, $HOME/.blacklab/ or /etc/blacklab/.
